title: India, Italy discuss deeper trade ties in clean energy, agri-tech: Finmin
description:
FM Nirmala Sitharaman

India and Italy on May 5 discussed opportunities to scale up bilateral trade and investment, with a sharp focus on clean energy, agri-food processing, and digital innovation, during a meeting between Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and her Italian counterpart Giancarlo Gio...
